video_prompt: Evolving futuristic black 3D characters, resembling numbers and letters, pulsate with internal red light and shift amidst sweeping black brushstrokes. Iridescent chromatic aberrations flicker and spread across the dynamic composition. Characters subtly morph and text within them continuously update, with the background strokes appearing to organically form and dissipate.
image_prompt: Abstract, futuristic digital art: Dark, metallic 3D shapes resembling numbers and letters (e.g., stylized '6', 'X', '3') with glowing red digital text/code and intricate circuit patterns, against a stark white background with bold black brushstrokes. Features iridescent chromatic aberrations and subtle geometric elements. Dynamic, high-tech, **monochromatic with red accents**, fusing traditional and digital aesthetics.
refined_video_prompt: Evolving futuristic black 3D characters, taking on number and letter-like forms, pulsate with shifting red internal light. They continuously morph and dynamically update their internal text. Sweeping black brushstrokes actively form and dissipate, causing constant background alterations. Iridescent chromatic aberrations flicker and spread, dynamically altering the entire composition.
